metadata.Title: CVE-2018-11243 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium.
metadata.Description: PackLinuxElf64::unpack in p_lx_elf.cpp in UPX 3.95 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (double free), limit the ability of a malware scanner to operate on the entire original data, or possibly have unspecified other impact via a crafted file.

criterions.comment: upx-ucl package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
